com.niton.media.visual

Class TiledImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.niton.media.visual.TiledImage

  • public class TiledImage
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the TiledImage Class
    A tiled image is a Image with many sub images
    It is used for World Tilesets or scalable pixel graphics
    Version:
    2017-08-18
    Author:
    Nils

        cols - count of the columns the image has
